## blockRendering.NextConnection.(constructor)

Constructs a new instance of the `NextConnection` class

**Signature:**

```typescript
constructor(constants: ConstantProvider, connectionModel: RenderedConnection);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  constants | [ConstantProvider](./blockly.blockrendering.constantprovider.md) | The rendering constants provider. |
